abstract: The Senate trial began with lots of pomp and little surprise, but there were some serious developments in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The official start of the trial meant that Thursday featured at least as much pageantry as Wednesday, when the articles were passed by the House of Representatives and marched over to the Senate. Hereâ€™s how things looked on Capitol Hill.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
